title: New Head Coaches Plus Divisional Round Preview | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 381)
description:
Kliff Kingsbury, Matt LaFleur, Vic Fangio, Adam Gase, Freddie Kitchens, and Bruce Arians all have new coaching jobs in the NFL (0:30), plus a closer look at the divisional round games (30:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
